page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE - ONE FAMILY.
page.content:
Every day I get up and go to school. The weekdays atmosphere is normal. Our family has got a shop. We sell a lot of things such as groceries and alcohol. The reasons why we bought a shop was because there is a lot of unemployment around in England at this point in time. There is also a lot of crime and violence. I think that is because of unemployment. In our shop we keep a good eye on people that come into our shop. Sometimes I have nothing to do, then I watch T.V. or work on the till. Sometimes we go out and eat pizzas. My favourite sports are Football, Cricket,Badminton, Pool and Snooker.
By Manjinder Dhillon (Newtown Primary School)
